home-text: I bring approximately 2 years of hands-on experience within the technology realm. My expertise lies in the creation of groundbreaking web applications, leveraging advanced technologies such as SpringBoot, Angular, NodeJS, MongoDB, MySQL. Through my proficiency, I excel in architecting robust,   user-centric solutions that push the boundaries of innovation and deliver exceptional user experiences.
about-text: Beyond coding, I'm a coffee enthusiast, a cat lover, and an athlete who likes to spend his free time exercising. I am currently seeking opportunities to bring my skills and enthusiasm to a tech company in the Brazil, United States or Europe and am excited about the prospect of relocating to pursue new challenges
projects-h2: Take a look at my highlight projects
contact-h2: Enjoyed my work? Let's work together
